overview: Big, Blonde, and oh so Hunky Johnny Utah stepped onto the scene in the 1990's. This Bi-Sexual Stud worked on only a hand full of movies. Boasting a fat beer-can dick and good looks this dynamo steals the show whenever the camera is pointed in his direction. Club Utah follows Johnny's exploits in a downtown Hollywood sex club, in this Chi Chi LaRue sizzler.
title: Club Utah
